hero.title: Remote Monitoring & Management
hero.subtitle: SlimRMM is the lightweight, secure, and GDPR-compliant solution for IT departments and MSPs. Each instance is completely standalone - your data stays with you.

features.title: Everything You Need for Modern IT Management
features.subtitle: SlimRMM combines all essential RMM features in a lean, high-performance solution

monitoring.title: Real-Time Monitoring
monitoring.description: CPU, RAM, disk, network - all metrics in real-time. Automatic alerts when thresholds are exceeded.

remote.title: Remote Access
remote.description: Web-based terminal, remote desktop and file manager. Manage systems directly in your browser.

software.title: Software & Patches
software.description: Complete software inventory, automatic updates and patch management for all platforms.

security.title: Security & Compliance
security.description: Vulnerability scanning, security policies, and automated GDPR compliance reports.

automation.title: Automation
automation.description: PowerShell, Bash and Python scripts. Scheduled tasks and automated workflows.

reporting.title: Reporting & Analytics
reporting.description: Detailed reports and dashboards. Export to CSV, PDF, Excel, and JSON.

proxmox.title: Proxmox VE Integration
proxmox.description: Manage VMs and containers directly from SlimRMM. Start, stop, restart and monitor status.

services.title: Service Management
services.description: View, start, stop and restart system services. Supports systemd, launchd and Windows Services.

compliance.title: Compliance Checks
compliance.description: Built-in and custom compliance rules. Automated security baseline verification across all platforms.

tagging.title: Asset Tagging
tagging.description: Organize and group endpoints with flexible tags. Filter and search across your entire fleet.

integrations.title: Powerful Integrations
integrations.subtitle: SlimRMM integrates seamlessly with your existing tools and notification systems

proxmox.title: Proxmox VE
proxmox.description: Native integration for Proxmox virtualization. Manage VMs and containers, monitor resources.

docker.title: Docker
docker.description: Full container management. Control images, containers, volumes and execute commands directly.

email.title: Email (SMTP)
email.description: SMTP integration for alert emails. TLS/SSL support with test functionality.

pushover.title: Pushover
pushover.description: Push notifications on iOS, Android, and desktop. Priority levels and custom sounds.

ntfy.title: ntfy
ntfy.description: Self-hosted push notifications. Open-source alternative with full control over your notifications.

gotify.title: Gotify
gotify.description: Self-hosted push notification server. Simple REST API with priority support.

mattermost.title: Mattermost
mattermost.description: Team chat integration via webhooks. Send alerts directly to your channels.

syslog.title: Syslog Forwarding
syslog.description: Forward logs to external SIEM systems via UDP or TCP. Centralize your logging infrastructure.

deployment.title: Choose Your Deployment Model
deployment.subtitle: Maximum flexibility: Host SlimRMM yourself for full data control or use our managed service

selfHosted.title: Self-Hosted
selfHosted.description: Full control over your data and infrastructure

sovereignty.title: Data Sovereignty
sovereignty.description: Your data never leaves your network

gdpr.title: GDPR Compliant
gdpr.description: No data transfer to third parties

managed.title: Managed Hosting
managed.description: We take care of operation, updates, and backups

pricing.title: Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Fair tiered pricing with no hidden costs. Pay only for what you need.

hosting.title: Managed Hosting Fees
hosting.description: Additional to package price for managed hosting (base price)

security.title: Enterprise-Grade Security
security.subtitle: SlimRMM was built from the ground up with security in focus

mtls.title: TLS 1.3 & mTLS
mtls.description: State-of-the-art encryption with mutual certificate authentication

zeroTrust.title: Zero Trust Architecture
zeroTrust.description: Every request is authenticated and authorized

rbac.title: Roles & Permissions
rbac.description: Fine-grained access control with 64+ permission scopes

mfa.title: Multi-Factor Authentication
mfa.description: TOTP authenticator apps and YubiKey OTP support

platforms.a: SlimRMM Agents are available for Windows (x64), macOS (Intel & Apple Silicon), and Linux (Debian/Ubuntu, RHEL/CentOS, Arch). The server runs on any Linux system with Docker.

migration.q: Can I switch from another RMM?
migration.a: Yes, SlimRMM can run alongside existing solutions. Our agents are lightweight and don't interfere with other software.

standalone.q: Are the RMM instances completely standalone?
standalone.a: Yes, each SlimRMM instance is fully independent. There's no central cloud component or telemetry. Your data never leaves your infrastructure or your chosen hosting environment.

support.a: All customers receive email support. Managed hosting customers also have access to premium support with faster response times.

updates.a: Agents update themselves automatically. With managed hosting, server updates happen automatically. Self-hosted customers can update via Docker pull.

scaling.a: SlimRMM was built for performance. A single server can manage thousands of agents. For larger deployments, we're happy to advise.

proxmox.q: How does the Proxmox integration work?
proxmox.a: Agents on Proxmox hosts automatically detect the virtualization environment. You can start, stop and monitor VMs and containers directly from the dashboard.
